sentence: What did the necrophiliac have when his grandmother died? mourning wood
explanation: a feeling of deep sorrow or grief
first_new_sentence: The family gathered to express their mourning after the loss of their patriarch.
second_new_sentence: The oak tree had a distinct mourning wood, giving it a unique appearance.
